attributes.additional_details: We are in 2024, a cost of living crisis and people are struggling to heat their homes and buy food for the table. We need a choice in where we spend our money on entertainment. The BBC was founded before the current choices on the market, it served a purpose which now no longer exists.
attributes.background: Make the BBC self funding, the amount of current & historic allegations is out of control. The culture is not representative of the time in which we live.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Abolish the tv licence
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701068
